resources.string:
Etop Agent Agreement

 By downloading the Etop mobile application or visiting the Etop website or using the Etop point of sales (POS) as a Etop Agent, you accept our terms and conditions in full. 

 1. Introduction:
 
 Etop is an agent banking platform that offers over-the-counter banking and financial services in partnership with commercial banks, payment service providers, cooperative societies, payment terminal service providers, billers, other financial institutions etc. to their customers via agent network. 

 Agents are independent retailers or resellers of Etop services. 

 Etop services include the following:
i. Bank Funds transfer/Cash deposit

 ii. Cash withdrawal via point-of-sale terminals

 iii. Bills payment

 iv. Airtime top-up

 v. Agent/customer loan

 vi. And other financial services that may be added to the Etop services from time to time.
 

2. Agent Eligibility:


i. Etop agency is intended solely for individuals who are 18 years and above. Any access or use of Etop by anyone under 18 years of age is unauthorized, unlicensed, and in violation of these terms of use. By accessing or using Etop, you consent that you are 18 years or older 

 ii. You must offer Etop services from a 4-walled physical location that is conducive and safe for conducting financial transactions 

 iii. You must possess a compactable working, internet enabled device to offer Etop services 

 iv. You must possess minimum of N200,000 working capital to offer Etop services 

 v. You must have at least 1 employee or personnel dedicated to offering Etop services to customers during the agent’s open hours 

 vi. You must be willing to perform mixed transactions at all time 

 vii. You are NOT an ex-convict and has never been involved in any form of financial fraud or criminal activities.


3. Obligations to the Agent: 

 The agent shall: i. Pay a non-refundable all applicable fee; either for registration, BVN verification or acquisition of Etop point-of-sale terminal(s) as it may apply 

 ii. Agree that all equipment including and not limited to point-of-sale terminal, mobile phone, computer, tablet and all other working tools or gadgets provisioned by Etop and in possession of the agent remain the property of Etop. You shall: 

 Surrender the equipment upon request by Etop. Failure to comply, you give Etop the right of arrest by law enforcement authorities 

 Ensure safe keeping of the equipment and shall be accountable for the equipment during which they are in the agent’s possession. Failure to comply, you give Etop the right of arrest by law enforcement authorities 

 Be responsible to replace lost or repair faulty equipment in your possession at own cost. Failure to comply, you give Etop the right of arrest by law enforcement authorities 

 iii. Operate, use and offer Etop services and equipment from ONLY the address(es) provided to Etop at point of registering as an agent. Where you intend to operate or offer Etop services or use Etop equipment from the address other than one provided at point of registration, you shall communicate the new address to Etop via written notice to Etop for approval 

 iv. Comply strictly with the pricing of Etop services that will be communicated to agents from time to time 

 v. Agree to display Etop and its partners banding merchandize at your operating locations 

 vi. Ensure to carefully review for accuracy and correctness of transaction request before transmitting such via Etop mobile application, website or POS 

 vii. Take full responsibility for own or employees’ errors and omissions in transaction requests transmitted to Etop as Etop will not be liable for any error or mistake by you or your employees 

 viii. Take full responsibility for transactions processed or conducted outside of the Etop system 

 ix. Ensure to take photo of customer face or identification document or signed attestation form by the customer as the case maybe from the Etop mobile application for cash withdrawal transaction amount over N30,000 (Thirty Thousand Naira Only) and for ALL Dispense Error Refund transactions, regardless of amount. Failure to comply may result in reversal of the transaction amount from your Etop agent account 

 x. Provide information available to you to aid investigations related to transactions conducted at your location or a customer to Etop or permitted law enforcement authorities 

 xi. Keep safely for at least six (6) months copies of cash withdrawal transaction receipt print out and make same available to Etop, the bank or law enforcement authorities within 24 hours upon request. Failure to comply may result in reversal of the transaction amount from your Etop agent account 

 xii. Report any suspicious financial transaction by customers in your operating location to Etop 

 xiii. Ensure compliance, where applicable to the minimum transaction target for Etop services as agreed with Etop 

 xiv. Keep sensitive information about your Etop agent account, including but not limited to login password, one-time password and transaction pin safe and never disclose them to anyone, staff or representative of Etop. Etop will not be held liable for your negligence or compromise. 


4. Exclusive Rights of Etop 

 Etop reserves the exclusive right to: 

 i. Terminate or suspend your access to Etop mobile application, website or point-of-sale terminal(s), in our sole discretion, at any time for any reason without notice to you. Further, if we believe, in our sole discretion, that a violation of these Terms of Use has occurred, we may take any other corrective action we deem appropriate. We reserve the right to investigate suspected violations of these Terms of Use. We may seek to gather information from an agent who is suspected of violating these Terms of Use (or from any other Agent) and you agree to provide us such information. 

 We will fully cooperate with any law enforcement authorities or court order requesting or directing us to disclose the identity of anyone posting, publishing, or otherwise making available any User information, emails, or other materials that are believed to violate these Terms of Use. Any suspension, termination, or cancellation shall not affect your obligations to Etop under these Terms of Use (including but not limited to ownership, indemnification, and limitation of liability), which by their sense and context are intended to survive such suspension, termination or cancellation 

 ii. Hold or reverse funds from the agent’s Etop account without prior notice to the agent where required 

 iii. Disclose information about the agent and their account activity to law enforcement authorities where required 


5. Limitation of Liability: 

 In no event shall Etop or any of its officers, directors, employees or representatives be liable to you for any damages whatsoever, including without limitation indirect, accidental, special, punitive or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with your use of Etop, content, tools and or user information, including but not limited to the quality, accuracy, or utility of the information provided as part of or through Etop or any decisions made on the basis of such information, whether the damages are foreseeable and whether or not Etop has been advised of the possibility of such damages. The foregoing limitation of liability shall apply to the fullest extent permitted by law in the applicable jurisdiction and in no event shall Etop’s cumulative liability to you exceed NGN 10,000 (Ten Thousand Naira Only) 

 6. Disclosures:
 Etop is operated by Etop Nigeria Limited- a certified Payment Terminal Service Provider duly registered with the Corporate Affairs Commission, Nigeria with RC Number: ******.

Disclaimer: Your transaction has been successfully processed and the beneficiary’s account will be credited. However, this does not serve as confirmation of credit into the beneficiary’s account. Due to the nature of internet, transactions may be subject to interruption, delayed transmission or incorrect transmission. Etop is not liable for malfunctions in communications facilities not within its control that may affect accuracy or timeliness of messages and transactions you send. All transactions are subject to verification and our normal fraud checks.
